title: Concordance
description: From the author of THE REACH BETWEEN WORLDS comes a heart-pounding adventure to find an ancient lost city.Renowned archaeologist Caiden Rycroft's world is turned upside down when he discovers a millennia-old warship marooned on a remote mountainside. Inside the wreckage lies the secret to finding the Corelight, an piece of primordial magic that could shift the balance of power in the world.What begins as a scholarly expedition quickly turns into a race to reach the Corelight before it can be corrupted.Combining epic fantasy and Lovecraftian themes, CONCORDANCE is a wonderful place to start your journey through the world of Arkos.
author: Cameron M. Hayden
